title: STK has locations across multiple countries
statement: STK Steakhouse operates restaurants in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Qatar, UAE, England, and Italy.

citations.quote: Arizona, California, Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Mexico Los Cabos, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Puerto Rico, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Washington, Ontario, Quebec, Doha, Dubai, London, Milan
